ground_truth: Stella takes a handful of oil and slaps it on Jeff's back, and he winces. She hits him with some more cold oil, and he winces again. Jeff gives an exasperated look. The camera pulls back as she helps Jeff to a sitting position, and he buttons on his shirt. The camera moves in as she helps him into the wheelchair, listening to him with exaggerated attention. He stops as he notices her attitude. Jeff now looks out to see what has happened to the old lady and the man with the flowers. The elderly lady is now asleep in her deck chair, her face covered with the Herald Tribune. Jeff's eyes travel up to the ballet dancer's window, where dreamily and methodically, she is brushing her long copper-colored hair. She is sitting near the window looking into an upright mirror. His eyes are suddenly turned in another direction, sharply to his left, where a shade has gone up, and a man, obviously a caretaker, is raising a window with some effort. Having accomplished this, he turns back into the room, and we now see him approach a young man and woman who are standing just inside the doorway. He is now looking at the windows of the apartments nearest to him. He hands a key to the young man and then obligingly brings in two suitcases which he places on the floor beside them. He gives them a studied but agreeable nod, then departs. We now see that the girl has a small hat with a veil and an ornate corsage pinned to her light blue tailored suit. The boy, who like the girl is perhaps twenty years old, wears a dark blue serge suit and a grey felt hat. Quickly they are in each other's arms, kissing passionately, crushing the girl's corsage and pushing her hat back a little. They part, the boy laughs nervously, and takes a furtive glance out toward the corridor. He looks back into the room and beckons her to come out. She follows him wonderingly. For a moment, both are lost from sight. When they reappear, he is carrying her in his arms over the threshold. He sets her down, closes the door, and they kiss again. Then slowly and significantly, she looks toward the open window. They part, still holding hands and looking into each other's eyes. He releases her hands, goes to the window and pulls down the shade, as she is reaching upward with both hands to unpin her hat. There is a soft, understanding look on Jeff's face, and he gives an involuntary sigh. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes, turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Stella grasps a fistful of oil and slaps it on Jeff's back, and he flinches. She strikes him with some more chilly oil, and he flinches again. Jeff gives an annoyed expression. The camera withdraws as she assists Jeff to a sitting position, and he fastens on his shirt. The camera advances as she aids him into the wheelchair, listening to him with overstated attention. He pauses as he observes her demeanor. Jeff now gazes out to see what has transpired with the old lady and the man with the blooms. The elderly lady is now dozing in her deck chair, her face covered with the Herald Tribune. Jeff's eyes travel up to the ballet dancer's window, where dreamily and methodically, she is brushing her long copper-colored hair. She is sitting near the window looking into an upright mirror. His eyes are suddenly turned in another direction, sharply to his left, where a shade has gone up, and a man, obviously a custodian, is raising a window with some effort. Having accomplished this, he turns back into the room, and we now see him approach a young man and woman who are standing just inside the doorway. He is now looking at the windows of the apartments closest to him. He hands a key to the young man and then obligingly brings in two suitcases which he places on the floor beside them. He gives them a studied but agreeable nod, then departs. We now see that the girl has a small hat with a veil and an elaborate corsage pinned to her light blue tailored suit. The boy, who like the girl is perhaps twenty years old, wears a dark blue serge suit and a grey felt hat. Quickly they are in each other's arms, kissing ardently, crushing the girl's corsage and pushing her hat back a little. They separate, the boy chuckles nervously, and takes a stealthy glance out toward the corridor. He looks back into the room and beckons her to come out. She follows him curiously. For a moment, both are lost from view. When they reappear, he is carrying her in his arms over the threshold. He sets her down, closes the door, and they kiss again. Then slowly and significantly, she looks toward the open window. They part, still holding hands and gazing into each other's eyes. He releases her hands, goes to the window and pulls down the shade, as she is reaching upward with both hands to unpin her hat. There is a soft, understanding look on Jeff's face, and he gives an involuntary sigh. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes, turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A handful of oil is taken by Stella and slapped on Jeff's back, and a wince is given by him. He is hit by her with some more cold oil, and a wince is given again. An exasperated look is given by Jeff. As she helps Jeff to a sitting position, his shirt is buttoned on by him, and the camera is pulled back. As she helps him into the wheelchair, she listens to him with exaggerated attention, and the camera moves in. Her attitude is noticed by him, and he stops. Jeff now looks out to observe what has been happening to the old lady and the man with the flowers. The elderly lady is found asleep in her deck chair, her face covered with the Herald Tribune. Jeff's eyes travel up to the ballet dancer's window, where her long copper-colored hair is dreamily and methodically brushed by her. Near the window, she is seated looking into an upright mirror. His eyes are suddenly turned sharply in another direction, to his left, where a shade has gone up, and a window is being raised with some effort by a man, obviously a caretaker. This accomplished, he turns back into the room, and he is now seen approaching a young man and woman standing just inside the doorway. The windows of the apartments nearest to him are being looked at by him. A key is handed by him to the young man, and then two suitcases are obligingly brought in by him, which he places on the floor beside them. A studied but agreeable nod is given by him, then he departs. It is now seen that the girl has a small hat with a veil and an ornate corsage pinned to her light blue tailored suit. The boy, who, like the girl, is perhaps twenty years old, wears a dark blue serge suit and a grey felt hat. Each other's arms are quickly engaged by them, kissing passionately, the girl's corsage is crushed, and her hat is pushed back a little. They part, a nervous laugh is given by the boy, and a furtive glance is taken by him out toward the corridor. He looks back into the room and beckons her to come out. Wonderingly, she follows him. For a moment, they are both lost from sight. When they reappear, she is carried by him over the threshold. She is set down, the door is closed, and another kiss is shared by them. Then slowly and significantly, she looks toward the open window. They part, hands are still held and eyes locked by them. Her hands are released by him, he goes to the window and the shade is pulled down by him, as her hat is being unpinned by her. There is a soft, understanding look on Jeff's face, and an involuntary sigh is given by him. He is unaware that Stella now stands behind him. He freezes, a slow turn is made by him to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that the lights are now on in some of the rooms.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Stella applies oil to Jeff's back, making him wince. She applies more, and he winces again, giving an exasperated look. As she assists Jeff into a sitting position and helps button his shirt, the camera moves in as she aids him into the wheelchair, listening attentively. Jeff notices her attitude and then looks outside. The elderly lady is asleep in her chair, face covered with the Herald Tribune. Jeff's gaze shifts to the ballet dancer, brushing her long copper hair near a window. His attention is drawn sharply left as a caretaker raises a window. The caretaker hands a key to a young couple inside, then brings in suitcases and nods before leaving. The girl wears a hat with a veil and a corsage on her blue suit; the boy wears a dark suit and felt hat. They kiss passionately, crushing the corsage and pushing her hat back. They part, and the boy glances outside, beckoning her. Disappearing briefly, they reappear as he carries her over the threshold. He sets her down, they kiss, and she looks at the window. He closes the shade as she unpins her hat. Jeff, unaware of Stella behind him, gives a soft sigh. He freezes, then slowly turns to her. The camera sweeps around the neighborhood, showing some rooms with lights on.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Stella slaps cold oil on Jeff's back, making him wince. Jeff appears frustrated. The camera zooms out as she helps him sit and button his shirt. It zooms in as she attentively helps him into a wheelchair. Jeff notices her attitude and looks out to see an elderly lady asleep under the Herald Tribune and a ballet dancer brushing her hair by the window. His gaze shifts left to a caretaker raising a window. The caretaker hands a key to a young couple, then leaves after nodding. The girl, in a light blue suit with a hat and corsage, and the boy, in a dark blue suit and hat, embrace and kiss. He nervously checks the corridor, beckons her, and carries her over the threshold. They kiss again as she looks toward the window. They part, hold hands, and he closes the shade as she removes her hat. Jeff sighs softly and is unaware of Stella behind him. He turns to her, and the camera briefly shows the neighborhood, where some rooms now have their lights on.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Stella, with a deliberate motion, reaches for a generous handful of oil and places it firmly on Jeff's back, causing him to wince in discomfort. She then applies another dose of cold oil, eliciting yet another wince from him. Jeff responds with an exasperated look, clearly expressing his irritation. As the camera gradually pulls back, we see Stella assisting Jeff into a sitting position, and he begins to button up his shirt with careful movements.

The camera, now focusing in again, captures Stella aiding Jeff into his wheelchair, while she listens to him with exaggerated, almost theatrical attentiveness. Jeff pauses, noticing her unusual behavior, and directs his attention outward to observe what has transpired with the old lady and the man bearing flowers. The scene reveals the elderly lady comfortably asleep in her deck chair, her face hidden beneath the pages of the Herald Tribune.

Jeff's gaze drifts upward to the window of the ballet dancer, where she is dreamily and methodically brushing her long, copper-colored hair. She sits serenely by the window, gazing into an upright mirror. Suddenly, Jeff's eyes shift sharply to his left, drawn by a commotion as a shade swiftly rises. A man, who appears to be a caretaker, is seen raising a window with visible effort. Once successful, he retreats back into the room, and we observe him approaching a young man and woman positioned just inside the doorway.

The caretaker hands a key to the young man, then dutifully and with a sense of obligation, brings in two suitcases, placing them carefully on the floor beside the couple. He offers them a meticulous yet amicable nod before departing. As the scene unfolds, it becomes clear that the girl is adorned with a small hat embellished with a veil, and an ornate corsage is prominently pinned onto her light blue, expertly tailored suit. The young man, equally youthful at perhaps twenty years old, is dressed in a dark blue serge suit accompanied by a grey felt hat.

Swiftly and with undeniable passion, they embrace, kissing fervently, which slightly crushes the girl's corsage and nudges her hat back a bit. They separate, with the boy emitting a nervous laugh, casting a quick, stealthy glance toward the corridor. He turns back to the room, signaling her to follow him. As she follows him with a puzzled expression, they momentarily vanish from view. Upon reappearing, he is holding her in his arms, carrying her over the threshold. He gently sets her down, closes the door behind them, and they share another kiss.

Slowly and with deliberate significance, she directs her gaze toward the open window. Though they separate, they continue to hold hands and gaze deeply into each other's eyes. He releases her hands, approaches the window, and lowers the shade, while she reaches up with both hands to unpin her hat. Jeff watches with a gentle, understanding expression on his face, releasing an involuntary sigh. In this moment, he remains blissfully unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes in place, slowly turning to meet her gaze. The camera performs a brief sweep around the neighborhood, revealing that some of the rooms are now illuminated with lights.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
With an intentional and deliberate motion, Stella reaches forward to grasp a generous handful of cold, slippery oil, which she then places firmly upon Jeff's bare back. This action prompts a wince of discomfort from Jeff, as he involuntarily reacts to the sensation. Undeterred, Stella applies a second, equally generous dose of the cold, unyielding oil, again eliciting a similar wince from Jeff. His response includes an exasperated look directed at Stella, clearly expressing his irritation and mild frustration at the ongoing situation. As the camera slowly and gradually begins to pull back, we can see Stella gently assisting Jeff into an upright, sitting position. Once situated, he starts to button up his shirt with careful, deliberate movements.

The camera, shifting focus once more and zooming in, captures the moment as Stella aids Jeff into his wheelchair. During this process, she listens to him with an exaggerated and almost theatrically attentive demeanor. Jeff pauses mid-sentence, noticing her unusually attentive behavior, before shifting his attention outward. His gaze is drawn to observe what has transpired with the elderly lady and the man who carries flowers. The scene unfolds to reveal the elderly lady comfortably dozing in her deck chair, with her face hidden beneath the crinkling pages of the Herald Tribune newspaper.

Jeff's gaze then wanders upward to the window, where a ballet dancer sits dreamily, methodically brushing her long, lustrous copper-colored hair. She is seated serenely by the window, captivated as she gazes into the upright mirror before her. Suddenly, Jeff's eyes are drawn sharply to his left, captured by a sudden commotion as a shade swiftly rises. A man, who appears to be a caretaker, is seen exerting visible effort as he raises a window. Once successful, he retreats into the room, continuing his tasks with diligence. He can be seen approaching a young man and woman, both positioned just inside the doorway.

The caretaker hands over a key to the young man, then dutifully, and with a sense of obligation, brings in two suitcases, carefully placing them on the floor beside the couple. He offers them a meticulous yet amicable nod before making his exit. As the scene progresses, we notice the girl is adorned with a small hat, stylishly embellished with a delicate veil, while an ornate corsage is prominently pinned onto her light blue, expertly tailored suit. The young man, appearing to be equally youthful at perhaps the age of twenty, is dressed in a dark blue serge suit, complemented by a grey felt hat.

With a swift and undeniable sense of passion, they embrace each other, kissing fervently, which slightly crushes her corsage and nudges her hat slightly askew. After separating, the boy emits a light, nervous laugh and casts a quick, stealthy glance toward the corridor outside. He turns back to the room, subtly signaling her to follow him. As she follows him with a puzzled expression, they momentarily vanish from view. Upon their reappearance, he is seen holding her tenderly in his arms, carrying her over the threshold of the doorway. He gently sets her down, closes the door behind them, and they share yet another affectionate kiss.

Slowly and with deliberate significance, she directs her gaze toward the open window. Though they separate physically, their connection remains as they continue to hold hands and gaze deeply into each other's eyes. He releases her hands, steps toward the window, and lowers the shade, while she reaches up with both hands to unpin her hat. Jeff, watching this intimate moment unfold, has a gentle, understanding expression on his face, releasing an involuntary sigh of contentment. In this moment of reverie, he remains blissfully unaware of Stella's presence as she quietly stands behind him. He freezes in place, slowly turning to meet her gaze. The camera performs a brief, sweeping journey around the neighborhood, revealing that some of the rooms in the surrounding area are now illuminated with lights.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Stella begins by reaching for a bottle of oil, pouring a generous amount into her palm before swiftly applying it to Jeff's back, the coolness of the oil causing him to wince noticeably. Noticing his reaction, she repeats the action, slapping another handful of cold oil onto his skin, and again, he flinches. Jeff's face communicates a mixture of irritation and discomfort through an exasperated expression. The camera gradually zooms out, capturing the scene as Stella assists Jeff in moving to a more comfortable, upright position, allowing him to reach for his shirt and methodically fasten each button. With a gentle push, she helps him transition from his chair to a wheelchair, all while she listens to him with exaggerated focus, her demeanor almost theatrical in its attentiveness. Jeff halts, visibly struck by her unusual behavior, before shifting his gaze outward to take in the view beyond. His attention first lands on the old lady, who now dozes peacefully in her deck chair, her face obscured by a copy of the Herald Tribune. His eyes continue their journey upwards to another window, where the ballet dancer sits in a trance-like state, rhythmically brushing her long, copper-colored hair while gazing into an upright mirror by the window. Abruptly, his focus snaps to the left as he catches movement; a shade is being lifted, revealing a man raising a window with deliberate effort. Once the window is secured, the man turns and approaches a pair standing by the doorway—a young man and woman. He hands the young man a key before retrieving two suitcases and placing them beside the couple, acknowledging them with a courteous nod before departing. The scene shifts to reveal the girl's ensemble: a tailored light blue suit adorned with a small hat featuring a veil and an intricate corsage. The boy, donning a dark blue serge suit complete with a grey felt hat, steps forward, and they quickly embrace, their kiss passionate enough to crumple the corsage and dislodge her hat slightly. They break apart, the boy chuckling nervously, casting a swift glance toward the corridor before turning back to beckon her to join him. She follows, curiosity piqued, and for a moment, they are obscured from view. When they reemerge, the boy carries her over the threshold, setting her down gently before closing the door and sharing another kiss. Their eyes lock as she looks meaningfully at the open window, prompting them to part while still clasping hands, their connection evident. As she lifts her hands to remove her hat, he walks to the window, pulling the shade down. Observing the scene, Jeff's face softens with understanding, and an unintended sigh escapes him, unaware of Stella's presence behind him. He freezes, slowly pivoting to meet her gaze, as the camera pans briefly around the neighborhood, revealing rooms now illuminated with the glow of lights.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Stella applies cold oil to Jeff's back, causing him to wince, and exchanges an exasperated look with him. She then assists him in sitting up and buttoning his shirt before helping him into a wheelchair, where she listens attentively to him. Jeff’s attention shifts to the window, where he observes the neighborhood. He notices the elderly lady asleep in her chair, a young ballet dancer brushing her hair dreamily by the window, and a caretaker who raises a window and hands a key to a young couple in a nearby apartment. The couple, dressed in suits and with the girl wearing a hat and corsage, passionately kiss before the boy checks the corridor and carries the girl over the threshold. They close the door, exchange another kiss, and share a meaningful look toward the open window. As they hold hands and gaze into each other's eyes, the boy lowers the shade just as the girl begins unpinning her hat. Jeff watches with a soft, understanding expression and sighs contentedly. Unbeknownst to him, Stella is now standing behind him, and he turns slowly to face her as the camera briefly surveys the neighborhood, revealing some rooms with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Stella, a nurse who prides herself on her practical skills, takes a handful of oil and slaps it on Jeff's back, and he winces. She applies some more cold oil, known for its role in physical therapy for sore muscles, and he winces again. Jeff, an avid observer of the world around him, gives an exasperated look. The camera pulls back as she helps Jeff to a sitting position, suggesting familiarity and routine, and he buttons on his shirt. The camera moves in as she helps him into the wheelchair, listening to him with exaggerated attention, a habit she insists is crucial for patient care. He stops as he notices her attitude, surprised by her unusually attentive demeanor. Jeff now looks out to see what has happened to the old lady, a long-time resident known for her love of gardening, and the man with the flowers, a regular visitor who often brings vibrant bouquets from the local market. The elderly lady is now asleep in her deck chair, her face covered with the Herald Tribune, an international newspaper favored for its in-depth analysis of current events. Jeff's eyes travel up to the ballet dancer's window, where dreamily and methodically, she is brushing her long copper-colored hair, which catches the late afternoon sun. She is sitting near the window looking into an upright mirror, a typical routine before her evening rehearsals. His eyes are suddenly turned in another direction, sharply to his left, where a shade has gone up, and a man, obviously a caretaker responsible for the building's maintenance, is raising a window with some effort. Having accomplished this, he turns back into the room, and we now see him approach a young man and woman who are standing just inside the doorway, clearly new tenants in the building. He is now looking at the windows of the apartments nearest to him, assessing any repair needs. He hands a key to the young man, indicating the start of their lease, and then obligingly brings in two suitcases which he places on the floor beside them. He gives them a studied but agreeable nod, then departs. We now see that the girl has a small hat with a veil and an ornate corsage pinned to her light blue tailored suit, likely suggesting a recent wedding or formal event. The boy, who like the girl is perhaps twenty years old, wears a dark blue serge suit, a popular choice for formal attire, and a grey felt hat. Quickly they are in each other's arms, kissing passionately, crushing the girl's corsage and pushing her hat back a little. They part, the boy laughs nervously, perhaps from the thrill of their new life together, and takes a furtive glance out toward the corridor. He looks back into the room and beckons her to come out. She follows him wonderingly, lost in the excitement of the moment. For a moment, both are lost from sight. When they reappear, he is carrying her in his arms over the threshold, a traditional gesture symbolizing the beginning of their married life. He sets her down, closes the door, and they kiss again. Then slowly and significantly, she looks toward the open window, contemplating the view of their new home. They part, still holding hands and looking into each other's eyes. He releases her hands, goes to the window, and pulls down the shade, as she is reaching upward with both hands to unpin her hat, signaling a private moment. There is a soft, understanding look on Jeff's face, and he gives an involuntary sigh, as if momentarily lost in the romance he observes. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him, watching his reverie. He freezes, turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood, a community of diverse stories, showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on, indicating the transition from day to evening activities.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. There is a soft understanding look on Jeff's face and he gives an involuntary sigh. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. The boy who like the girl is perhaps twenty years old wears a dark blue serge suit and a grey felt hat. Quickly they are in each other's arms kissing passionately crushing the girl's corsage and pushing her hat back a little. They part. the boy laughs nervously and takes a furtive glance out toward the corridor. He looks back into the room and beckons her to come out. She follows him wonderingly. For a moment both are lost from sight. When they reappear he is carrying her in his arms over the threshold. He sets her down closes the door and they kiss again. Then slowly and significantly she looks toward the open window. They part still holding hands and looking into each other's eyes. He releases her hands goes to the window and pulls down the shade as she is reaching upward with both hands to unpin her hat. There is a soft understanding look on Jeff's face and he gives an involuntary sigh. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Stella takes a handful of oil and slaps it on Jeff's back and he winces. She hits him with some more cold oil and he winces again. Jeff gives an exasperated look. The camera pulls back as she helps Jeff to a sitting position and he buttons on his shirt. The camera moves in as she helps him into the wheelchair listening to him with exaggerated attention. He stops as he notices her attitude. Jeff now looks out to see what has happened to the old lady and the man with the flowers. The elderly lady is now asleep in her deck chair her face covered with the Herald Tribune. He sets her down closes the door and they kiss again. Then slowly and significantly she looks toward the open window. They part still holding hands and looking into each other's eyes. He releases her hands goes to the window and pulls down the shade as she is reaching upward with both hands to unpin her hat. There is a soft understanding look on Jeff's face and he gives an involuntary sigh. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Stella takes a handful of oil and slaps it on Jeff's back and he winces. She hits him with some more cold oil and he winces again. Jeff gives an exasperated look. The camera pulls back as she helps Jeff to a sitting position and he buttons on his shirt. He is unaware that Stella is now standing behind him. He freezes turns slowly to look up at her. The camera makes a short sweep around the neighborhood showing that some of the rooms are now with their lights on.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Gina grabs a spoonful of honey and tosses it at Mike's arm, and he chuckles. She sprinkles him with some more warm honey, and he chuckles again. Mike gives an amused grin. The lens zooms out as she assists Mike to a kneeling stance, and he zips up his jacket. The lens zooms in as she aids him onto the tricycle, chatting with him with excessive curiosity. He halts as he observes her demeanor. Mike now peeks out to discover what has occurred to the young girl and the dog with the balloons. The youthful girl is now snoozing in her recliner, her face shielded with the Daily Gazette. Mike's gaze drifts upward to the opera singer's balcony, where serenely and mechanically, she is twisting her short golden curls. She is seated beside the balcony peering into a handheld mirror. His gaze is abruptly redirected, sharply to his right, where a curtain has dropped, and a woman, clearly a gardener, is lowering a blind with some difficulty. Having completed this, she turns back to the garden, and we now observe her approach an old woman and child who are lounging just by the fence. She is now gazing at the rooftops of the buildings closest to her. She hands a note to the old woman and then helpfully brings in two baskets which she places on the ground beside them. She gives them a practiced but pleasant salute, then exits. We now notice that the child has a tiny ribbon with a brooch and an elaborate boutonniere clipped to her bright yellow wool dress. The grandparent, who like the child is possibly fifty years old, dons a light brown corduroy dress and a white straw bonnet. Swiftly they are in each other's arms, embracing cheerfully, squashing the child's boutonniere and adjusting her ribbon forward slightly. They separate, the grandparent giggles shyly, and takes a secretive peek out toward the pathway. She looks back to the garden and motions for her to join her. She trails him inquisitively. For a moment, both vanish from view. When they surface, she is holding her in her hands over the threshold. She sets her down, latches the gate, and they embrace once more. Then slowly and suggestively, she glances toward the opened curtain. They separate, still clutching hands and gazing into each other's faces. She releases her hands, goes to the curtain and raises the blind, as she is lowering downward with both hands to adjust her ribbon. There is a gentle, sympathetic expression on Mike's face, and he releases an unplanned gasp. He is oblivious that Gina is now positioned beside him. He stiffens, swivels gradually to glance up at her. The lens performs a brief pan around the community revealing that several of the gardens are now with their candles lit.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Stella slaps cold oil on Jeff's back, causing him to wince. She helps him sit up and into his wheelchair, listening intently, which surprises Jeff. He glances outside to see the elderly lady asleep in her chair and a ballet dancer brushing her hair. His attention shifts to a man raising a window, who then assists a young couple by handing them a key and placing their suitcases beside them. The girl, in a blue suit and hat, and the boy, in a dark suit, embrace passionately, crushing her corsage. The boy nervously checks the corridor and beckons the girl. They disappear momentarily and reemerge with him carrying her over the threshold. They share another kiss, and she looks at the open window. After pulling down the shade, she removes her hat. Jeff, touched, sighs involuntarily, not noticing Stella behind him. He turns to face her, while the camera captures the neighborhood, noting the lit rooms.
